Final Annotation

Final Annotation#

Final annotation was done by naming the clusters given in the initial processing and filtering from the leiden calculation. This gave us the different clusters depending on the variability of the genes on each cluster. After further analysis from CellTypist, Gene Expression, and RNA velocity, this clusters can be manually renamed to obtain the final annotation values which show us the differences inside our sample.

# Example custom hex colors
custom_colors = {
   "Early AT2 Like Cells": "#0AB59B",   # reddish
    "Proliferating AT2 Like Cells": "#FF8C00",   # teal/greenish
    "Late AT2 Like Cells": "#EE204D",   # blue-green
    "'ASCL1+' AT2 Like Cells": "#9500FF"   # purple
}

# Assign colors to AnnData
at2_h_lp_filt.uns['HL_annot_final_colors'] = [
    custom_colors[str(cat)] for cat in at2_h_lp_filt.obs['HL_annot_final'].cat.categories
]

#sc.pl.umap(at2_h_lp_filt,color=['HL_annot_final'], legend_fontsize=8)
sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "final_annot_1",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color=['HL_annot_final'],
    legend_fontsize=8,
    caption = 'UMAP of final annotation of cell clusters from sample.',
    kind="scanpy"
)

UMAP of final annotation of cell clusters from sample.
Download TIFF (600 dpi) 

#sc.pl.umap(at2_h_lp_filt,color=['leiden'], legend_fontsize=8)
sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "final_annot_2",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color=['leiden'],
    legend_fontsize=8,
    caption = 'UMAP of leiden clustering',
    kind="scanpy"
)

UMAP of leiden clustering
Download TIFF (600 dpi) 

sc.tl.dendrogram(at2_h_lp_filt, groupby = "HL_annot_final")
marker_genes_HL_AT2 = {
    "AT2": ["SFTPC","SFTPB","SLC34A2","LPCAT1","LAMP3","CLDN18","HOPX","NAPSA","TTF1"],
    "Mature AT2": ["ABCA3","SFTPA1","SFTPA2","SLPI","SFTPD","DNMT1"],
    "Proliferative AT2": ["TOP2A","MKI67","CCND1","LMNB1","BIRC5"],
    "Neuroendocrine": ["ASCL1","SEC11C","SCG5","CALCA",'HIF1A','CHGA','GRP','CDH1'],
    "Other": ["EPCAM",'CPM']
}
#sc.pl.dotplot(at2_h_lp_filt, marker_genes_HL_AT2, groupby = ["HL_annot_final"], dendrogram=True)
sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.dotplot,
    "final_annot_3",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    marker_genes_HL_AT2,
    groupby = ["HL_annot_final"], 
    dendrogram=True,
    caption = 'Dotplot of cell specific markers.',
    kind="scanpy"
)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

# Crosstab normalized by columns (%)
tmp = pd.crosstab(
    at2_h_lp_filt.obs['HL_annot_final'],
    at2_h_lp_filt.obs['sample'],
    normalize='columns'
) * 100

# Plot stacked bar chart
ax = tmp.T.plot(kind='bar', stacked=True, figsize=(9, 7))

# Simplify aesthetics
ax.spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['right'].set_visible(False)
ax.grid(False)

# Calculate overall % for each cell type (mean across samples or total)
celltype_perc = tmp.mean(axis=1)  # average across samples
# celltype_perc = tmp.sum(axis=1) / len(tmp.columns)  # alternative if you prefer total proportions

# Update legend labels with percentages
handles, labels = ax.get_legend_handles_labels()
new_labels = [
    f"{label} ({celltype_perc[label]:.1f}%)" for label in labels
]
ax.legend(handles, new_labels, title="CellTypeAnnotation",
          bbox_to_anchor=(1.25, 1.02), loc="upper left")

# Add percentage labels on side of bars
for p in ax.patches:
    width, height = p.get_width(), p.get_height()
    x, y = p.get_xy()

    if height > 3:  # skip tiny bars
        ax.annotate(f'{height:.1f}%',
                    (x + width, y + height/2),
                    ha='left', va='center',
                    fontsize=8)

# Labels and title
plt.xlabel('Sample', fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel('Percentage (%)', fontsize=12)
plt.title('Cell Type Composition per Sample', fontsize=14)

sc_plot_and_embed(
    ax,
    "final_annot_6",
    caption = 'Barchart showing percentage of each cluster of cells within the sample.',
    kind="matplotlib"
)

Barchart showing percentage of each cluster of cells within the sample.
Download TIFF (600 dpi) 

geneList_AT2 = ["SFTPC","SFTPB","SLC34A2","CPM","LPCAT1","LAMP3","CLDN18","HOPX","NAPSA","TTF1"]
geneList_Mature = ["ABCA3","SFTPA1","SFTPA2","SLPI","NAPSA","SFTPD"]
geneList_Prolif= ["TOP2A","MKI67","CCND1","LMNB1","BIRC5"]
geneList_Neuroendocrine = ["ASCL1","SEC11C","SCG5","CALCA",'CHGA','GRP','CDH1']
geneList_Hypoxic = ['HIF1A','HIF2A','KLF4','KLF5']
geneList_Ionocytes = ['ASCL3','SEC11C'] 
geneList_Other = ["EPCAM","CPM"]

#sc.pl.umap(at2_h_lp_filt,color= ["SFTPC","SFTPB","SLC34A2","CPM","LPCAT1","LAMP3","CLDN18","HOPX","NAPSA","TTF1"], 
#           legend_fontsize=8, cmap = 'Reds')
sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "final_annot_7",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color= ["SFTPC","SFTPB","SLC34A2","CPM","LPCAT1","LAMP3","CLDN18","HOPX","NAPSA","TTF1"],
    legend_fontsize = 8,
    cmap = 'Reds',
    caption = 'UMAP of AT2 markers.',
    kind="scanpy"
)

UMAP of AT2 markers.
Download TIFF (600 dpi) 

# Step 1: Check which of your requested genes are actually present
geneList_AT2 = ["SFTPC","SFTPB","SLC34A2","CPM","LPCAT1","LAMP3","CLDN18","HOPX","NAPSA","TTF1"]

available_genes = [g for g in geneList_AT2 if g in at2_h_lp_filt.var_names]
missing_genes = [g for g in geneList_AT2 if g not in at2_h_lp_filt.var_names]

print("✅ Genes found:", available_genes)
print("❌ Genes missing:", missing_genes)

# Step 2: Only subset by available genes
expr = at2_h_lp_filt[:, available_genes].to_df()

# Step 3: Add condition info
expr["Condition"] = at2_h_lp_filt.obs["HL_annot_final"].values

# Step 4: Reshape into long format
df_long = expr.melt(id_vars="Condition", var_name="Gene", value_name="Expression")

# Step 5: Define palette
palette = {
    "Early AT2 Like Cells": "#0AB59B",
    "Proliferating AT2 Like Cells": "#FF8C00",
    "Late AT2 Like Cells": "#EE204D",
    "'ASCL1+' AT2 Like Cells": "#9500FF"
}

# Step 6: Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10,4))
plot = sns.violinplot(
                        data=df_long,
                        x="Gene", y="Expression", hue="Condition",
                        palette=palette,
                        cut=0,
                        scale="width",
                        inner=None
                    )

plt.ylabel("Expression Level")
plt.xlabel("")
plt.legend(title="", bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc="upper left")
plt.tight_layout()

sc_plot_and_embed(
    plot,
    "final_annot_8",
    caption = 'Violin plot of AT2 markers.',
    kind="seaborn"
)

✅ Genes found: ['SFTPC', 'SLC34A2', 'LAMP3', 'CLDN18', 'HOPX']
❌ Genes missing: ['SFTPB', 'CPM', 'LPCAT1', 'NAPSA', 'TTF1']

Violin plot of AT2 markers.
Download TIFF (600 dpi)

#           legend_fontsize=8, cmap = 'Reds')
sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "final_annot_9",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color= ["ABCA3","SFTPA1","SFTPA2","SLPI","NAPSA","SFTPD"],
    legend_fontsize = 8,
    cmap = 'Reds',
    caption = 'UMAP of Mature AT2 markers.',
    kind="scanpy"
)

# Step 1: Check which of your requested genes are actually present
geneList_AT2 = ["EPCAM","CPM"]

available_genes = [g for g in geneList_AT2 if g in at2_h_lp_filt.var_names]
missing_genes = [g for g in geneList_AT2 if g not in at2_h_lp_filt.var_names]

print("✅ Genes found:", available_genes)
print("❌ Genes missing:", missing_genes)

# Step 2: Only subset by available genes
expr = at2_h_lp_filt[:, available_genes].to_df()

# Step 3: Add condition info
expr["Condition"] = at2_h_lp_filt.obs["HL_annot_final"].values

# Step 4: Reshape into long format
df_long = expr.melt(id_vars="Condition", var_name="Gene", value_name="Expression")

# Step 5: Define palette
palette = {
    "Early AT2 Like Cells": "#0AB59B",
    "Proliferating AT2 Like Cells": "#FF8C00",
    "Late AT2 Like Cells": "#EE204D",
    "'ASCL1+' AT2 Like Cells": "#9500FF"
}

# Step 6: Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10,4))
sns.violinplot(
    data=df_long,
    x="Gene", y="Expression", hue="Condition",
    palette=palette,
    cut=0,
    scale="width",
    inner=None
)

plt.ylabel("Expression Level")
plt.xlabel("")
plt.legend(title="", bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc="upper left")
plt.tight_layout()

sc_plot_and_embed(
    plot,
    "final_annot_19",
    caption = 'Violin plot of Other markers.',
    kind="seaborn"
)

✅ Genes found: []
❌ Genes missing: ['EPCAM', 'CPM']
